languages.text: "Про неоправданное доверие — в точку, свинья ты бессовестная".
"The part about disappointed trust is quite right, you manipulative pig."
languages.original_text: "Про неоправданное доверие — в точку, свинья ты бессовестная".

traits.locale_text: "The part about disappointed trust is quite right, you manipulative pig."

languages.text: « C'est le moins que l'on puisse dire, sale manipulateur. »
languages.original_text: "The part about disappointed trust is quite right, you manipulative pig."

traits.locale_text: « C'est le moins que l'on puisse dire, sale manipulateur. »

languages.text: 「信頼を裏切られたってところはまさにその通りだ、狡猾な豚め」
languages.original_text: "The part about disappointed trust is quite right, you manipulative pig."

traits.locale_text: 「信頼を裏切られたってところはまさにその通りだ、狡猾な豚め」

languages.text: «Lo de traicionar mi confianza es bien cierto, cerdo manipulador».
languages.original_text: "The part about disappointed trust is quite right, you manipulative pig."

traits.locale_text: «Lo de traicionar mi confianza es bien cierto, cerdo manipulador».

languages.text: “关于失望的那部分你倒是没说错，你这个玩弄人心的人渣。”
languages.original_text: "The part about disappointed trust is quite right, you manipulative pig."

traits.locale_text: “关于失望的那部分你倒是没说错，你这个玩弄人心的人渣。”

languages.text: "Güveni suistimal etme kısmında haklıydın. Adi domuz seni."
languages.original_text: "The part about disappointed trust is quite right, you manipulative pig."

traits.locale_text: "Güveni suistimal etme kısmında haklıydın. Adi domuz seni."

languages.text: "Was das enttäuschte Vertrauen angeht, habt Ihr recht, Ihr manipulatives Schwein!"
languages.original_text: "The part about disappointed trust is quite right, you manipulative pig."

traits.locale_text: "Was das enttäuschte Vertrauen angeht, habt Ihr recht, Ihr manipulatives Schwein!"
